import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import "./MainList.css" import useMainHook from "../../Hooks/Main/useMainHook" import { useRecoilState } from "recoil"; import {mainPageNumState, mainTotalPageNumState} from "../../stores/mainState" import TimeCounting from "time-counting"; import moment from "moment" import 'moment/locale/ko' const MainList = () => { const { getProject,project,setProject } = useMainHook(); const [pageNum,setPageNum] = useRecoilState(mainPageNumState); const [totalPage,setTotalPage] = useRecoilState(mainTotalPageNumState); useEffect( async ()=>{ getProject(pageNum).then((res)=>{ setProject(res.data.projectList) setTotalPage(res.data.totalPages) }) },[]) return(
{ project.map((project)=>( <> {console.log(project)} )) }
제목 작성자(리더) 내용 생성 날짜 좋아요 태그 삭제여부
{project.title} {project.users[0].name} 가나다라마바사아자차카타파하 {moment(project.creatAt).format('YYYY MMMM Do')} {project.creatAt.format('YYYY MMMM Do')}
{console.log(moment(project.creatAt))} {moment(project.creatAt).format('h:mm.ss a')} 		18개 {project.tags[0]}
삭제
) } export default MainList;
